Module com.example.smartbird
Package com.example.smartbird

Class Layer

java.lang.Object
com.example.smartbird.Layer
public class Layer extends Object
Note: this class represents hidden and output layers, but the input layer of the neural network will be represented by a simple double array.

    • calculateOutput

      public void calculateOutput(double[] input)
      forward propagation. Calculate the value of the neurons.
      Parameters:
      input - the values of the neurons in the previous layer. Size should be equal to the inputCount.

    • randomize

      public void randomize(double min_weight, double max_weight, double min_bias, double max_bias)
      Randomize all weights and biases and associated with this layer.
      Parameters:
      min_weight - Minimum value for each weight.
      max_weight - Maximum value for each weight.
      min_bias - Minimum value for each bias.
      max_bias - Maximum value for each bias.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • fromString

      public static Layer fromString(String str, int inputCount, int neuronCount)
      Converts string into a new instance of Layer.
      Parameters:
      str - The string. result of the toString function.
      inputCount - The amount of neurons in the previous layer.
      neuronCount - The amount of neurons in the current layer.
      Returns:
      The layer that was converted into the given string.
